impositionOffenceDetails.details:
SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
Committed to prison for 3 Months suspended for 1 Years. Reason: failure to express willingness to comply with a proposed requirement for a community order. UPWR - Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
Unpaid Work Requirement: Carry out unpaid work for 10 Hours within the next twelve months. This work will be supervised by the responsible officer.
Total custodial period 1 Months. Supervision period: 1 Years.
